message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you coming down to $14,000, but I'm really hoping to get it for a bit less.  How about $13,000? That would be a great price for both of us.

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $13,800. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of this product at this price. What do you think?
